entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as being left beside the fire with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character in the story and is mentioned as asking Harry if he has seen Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a main character in the story and is mentioned as being absent from the scene with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a main character in the story and is mentioned as going to bed not long after Fred and George.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a main character in the story and is mentioned as sloping off to bed with his brother George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a main character in the story and is mentioned as sloping off to bed with his brother Fred.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is a person who is mentioned as following She (presumably Ginny) into the room.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is a person who is mentioned as following Alicia and Ginny into the room.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is an object that swings forward to reveal Ron coming through the portrait hole.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are left beside the fire together.
Hermione asks Harry if he has seen Ron, indicating that Harry is concerned about Ron's whereabouts.
Hermione is also concerned about Ron's whereabouts and asks Harry if he has seen him.
Ron comes through the portrait hole and joins Harry and Hermione.
Hermione helps Ron by asking him where he has been and offering to let him sit down.
